Reference

All functions

lgb.sur()

fit a survival model from LightGBM

sim_surv_lgb_tree()

Simple survival tree lgb

sim_surv_xgb_tree()

Simple survival tree xgb

surv_risk_aut()

get risk level for survival data

surv_risk_aut_lgbcv()

get risk level for survival data with lgbcv object

surv_risk_aut_xgbcv()

get risk level for survival data with xgbcv object

surv_risk_m()

get risk level for survival data manually

surv_risk_m_lgbcv()

get risk level for survival data manually

surv_risk_m_xgbcv()

get risk level for survival data manually

xgb.sur()

Fit a survival model with XGBoost

xsurv_predict()

This function allows you to transform survival prediction from risk score to survival time.
